sentences.sContent: The way we kill animals appals a lot of people.
sentences.sCn: 我们屠杀动物的方式令许多人震惊。

sentences.sContent: The decision to execute the two men has appalled many politicians.
sentences.sCn: 处死那两名男子的判决令许多从政者震惊。

synos.tran: 减弱；变得苍白；令人发腻

remMethod.val: ap+pall (看作pale， 苍白的)→吓得脸煞白→使惊骇

words.tran: 令人毛骨悚然地；骇人听闻地

trans.tranOther: to make someone feel very shocked and upset
